snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include the job you can’t list any more on LinkedIn, an imaginary response from Bloomberg News about its scandal and...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include the job you can’t list any more on LinkedIn, an imaginary response from Bloomberg News about its scandal and technology investors financing coffee shops.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Hidden Online Audiences and Cicada Math
